title: Checkbox
content: Accessible Checkbox component. Uses aria-checked, aria-label. Form Input. screen reader

title: Accordion
content: Accessible Accordion component. Uses aria-expanded, aria-label. Ideal for FAQs. screen reader

title: Menu
content: Accessible Menu component. Uses aria-label, aria-labelledby, role='menu', role='button', aria-controls, aria-haspopup. Focus trap. Intuitive Keyboard navigation, interaction. Escape key closes menu. screen reader

title: Radio
content: Accessible Radio component. Ideal for selecting one option from many. screen reader

title: Block
content: Accessible Block component. Focus trap. Intuitive Keyboard navigation, interaction

title: Toggle
content: Accessible Toggle switch component. Uses aria-pressed, aria-label. Ideal for dark mode, settings, and preferences. screen reader
